DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not progression was evident using PSA measurement.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prostate Specific Antigen Measurement Cancer Progression Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The determination of the prostate specific antigen present in a sample._A pathologic process in which alterations at the molecular level result in a more aggressive cytologic and phenotypic profile and clinical course of a malignant neoplasm._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.
